author: @svaughn8891
text: Hi, like your video.  Copied the code from your code repository, but I get this error: > # Create a dataframe containing the urls of the web  > # pages and their converted datetimes > marketwatch_webpgs_datetimes <- data.frame( +   WebPg=urls, DateTime=datetime_convert + ) Error in data.frame(WebPg = urls, DateTime = datetime_convert) :    object 'urls' not found  When I scan the code for where an assignment is made to urls, the first reference to urls seems to be in line 75 (the place I get the error).  So where is the variable urls created and assigned?
